vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὄψῐμος, ον,
(ὀψέ) poetry for ὄψιος, late, slow, τέρας ὄ. for (concerned with) a late time, [Refs 8th c.BC+]: in Prose, late in the season, σπόρος [Refs 5th c.BC+]; of crops, [LXX+3rd c.BC+]; ἐν τοῖς ὀ. τῶν ὑδάτων [NT+1st c.BC+]: comparative, καιρὸς -ώτερος [Refs 3rd c.AD+]; recent, ποιητική [Refs 1st c.AD+]. adverb -μως[Refs 8th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: late (in the season, April-May in the modern calendar), spring
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
late (in the season, April-May in the modern calendar), spring
late; latter, spring Jas. 5:7; poetic and later prose for ὄψιος*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: lluvia tardía (de la luvia que llega tarde en la estación), lluvia de primavera
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 春雨, 晚雨 (三,四月) (約 5:7)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 春雨, 晚雨 (三,四月) (约 5:7)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: muộn; mưa thu … mưa xuân “Mưa đầu tiên” vào mùa thu, và “mưa cuối” vào mùa xuân.
